rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 14 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:05 PM, 20 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Tarlac, Zambales, Batangas and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Pasig, Taguig), Rizal(Cainta, Taytay, Antipolo), Bulacan(Calumpit, Hagonoy, Paombong, Malolos, Pulilan, Plaridel, San Miguel, San Ildefonso, Baliuag), Pampanga(Masantol, Macabebe, Minalin, Santo Tomas, San Simon, Apalit, San Luis, Candaba, Santa Ana, Mexico, Arayat, San Fernando, Bacolor), Nueva Ecija(Cabiao, San Isidro, Gapan), Quezon(Real, Mauban) and Laguna(Lumban, Kalayaan, Paete) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
